website_summaries.verdict: A pretty, eye-catching ankle bracelet that's worthy of gift-giving and wearing for special occasions; but may not be the best choice for those who plan to wear it every day.
pros: Dainty yet makes a statement, as it has a sparkly cubic zirconia embellished infinity symbol
Makes a nice gift for a significant other
cons: Chain is quite delicate, and  customer service could be more attentive

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful anklet for my wife.
customer_reviews.text: My wife has worn this anklet for over a year. She never takes it off and even showers with it on and yet it has not discolored. She has received compliments on her feet because the sterling silver really sets off against her beautiful caramel colored feet. It is very durable and has held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this anklet! Feels and looks great! I have not taken it off since it arrived. I’ve been to the river and the beach and it remains just as pretty (see pics) the size is perfect as it’s adjustable and the “extra” looks just as pretty with the little heart that dangles at the end. I definitely recommend 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous, strong and sparkly!
customer_reviews.text: I love this anklet! Not only is it pretty and sparkly, it's durable! I wore it for 2 months straight and only took it off when I had knee surgery. It still looks gorgeous! It also made me feel like my feet were pretty, they are not! I have some seriously messed up feet. So yeah, that was a huge bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Zeebootee

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and sturdy. Usually my anklets break but This one has held up. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Shipping was fast and in nice package. Overall 110% happy
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife. She loves it. Wears it on a daily basis. It's been about 3 weeks now and it still remains shiny and bright. No discoloration of any kind. Shipping was fast and in nice package. Overall 110% happy. And so is my wife!
customer_reviews.author: Michael R.

customer_reviews.title: A little larger than average wrist....
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mom who has a litter bigger than average wrist. A lot of bracelets have that little chain tail that hangs down but many times it obvious where the bracelet would technically end and the "extra" begins. I don't think it's obvious on this one. Plus the fact that it's an anklet helps the length issue too! Very excited to give it to her!!!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: A Personally Meaningful Anklet
customer_reviews.text: I searched for an anklet for three years and this one just hit me right away. I LOVE the way it fits and looks and it means a lot to me. I can't really share what it means to me personally, however I could tell you that the anklet serves the message well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice! Perfect for a “Hot Wife “ First weekend ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! Perfect for a “Hot Wife “ First weekend she wore it she was approached. It’s a very common hot wife anklet.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Gold One Is Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I love this anklet! Very beautiful with gold covering and shiny crystals. As you can see from the picture I have large ankles, so the anklet alone was not quite long enough. So, I added an extension onto it and it fits just fine now. The infinity symbol is solid and I love the little hearts in the chain. This would work well for a gift for someone else or yourself! I can't say how well it will last, but it seems to be pretty high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon J

customer_reviews.title: Color fades
customer_reviews.text: It is a very nice anklet but the rose gold color has completely worn off and it is now a silver color. Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: SierraNevada

customer_reviews.title: Plated
customer_reviews.text: GF LOVES this anklet and never takes it off. however, she went in the pool in palm springs. plating came off and all that was left was the filler metal. Said screw it, bought her another one. super shiny and nice, we both love it. VERY sexy on her tan little feet. live and learn not to go swimming in it, chlorine i imagine. corrosive. Not all the way through sterling silver but for the price it is a great buy. does not fall off or break. maybe women with big feet and thick ankles have it snap cuz its too tight.
customer_reviews.author: simi guy

customer_reviews.title: A bit too light, but still a great little anklet
customer_reviews.text: Liked it, but wish it could be a bit "beefier" with a stronger and heavier chain, and a bit larger and heavier "infinity sign" with some more "bling bling" to it. Down on the ankle it is not easily seen, and the chain seems like it might break too easily. I suppose what I want would cost a lot more, but I would be willing to pay a lot more for it.
customer_reviews.author: Deacon Blues

customer_reviews.title: Nice anklet
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice anklet. The crystals are small and not noticeable on the infinity rings. I wear it 24/7 and it is working out well.
customer_reviews.author: prime shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this anklet for my sister and she just LOVES it. Trust me, if she loves it, its good. She is very fussy and can find something wrong with just about anything! So if you think you like this bracelet, get it. She said: "It is beautiful, giftable, sturdy and durable."
customer_reviews.author: joyce from NJ

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful as expected
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful as expected. However where the infinity oval crosses there are some noticeable imperfections. Enough imperfections that if it were a bracelet I would return but since its on my ankle I suppose no one will notice.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: This anklets is incredible!
customer_reviews.text: I put this on almost two months ago and haven’t taken it off. I have been kayaking, white water rafting, in hot tubs, swimming pools, lakes, rivers, mud, and showers in tap and well water. It looks just like the day it came. Durable and cute. Order now!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Brinkman

customer_reviews.title: I usually don't write reviews but I love this beautiful ankle bracelet so much that I have ...
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't write reviews but I love this beautiful ankle bracelet so much that I have to give 5 stars. I bought it two months ago and I'm wearing it since then, the color didn't change. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Pineda

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice - Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I was not expecting the quality I received. I bought several as gifts and I have only received stunning remarks. Very happy I took the time to read other reviews before buying. All the reviews were excellent and I now see why.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this anklet. It's adjustable and fits around your ankle and doesn't flip over like some would

customer_reviews.title: The chain is too long
customer_reviews.text: Really liked this BUT it is so long that the chain hangs down about 3 inches after you fasten it keeps getting hung on stuff I ended up using it as an ankle chin I really wanted it as a bracelet as it is really pretty and match’s my necklace it is just too long!!

customer_reviews.title: It is very very pretty and I really liked it but it broke twice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this about a month ago. It is very very pretty and I really liked it but it broke twice. I was lucky enough to find it both times but it costs more to repair it than the original purchase price. Very disappointed. As an update had it repaired the second time and it broke again. Three times in 6 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Grinnell

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Had this for a few months now and no complaints! Other than the time my husband pulled on my leg while we were swimming and broke the chain...quick stop at a jewelry repair and good as new! I do everything with it on and haven't had another incident lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for an anklet for a while, and tried a few others (not purchased through Amazon or made this company) that broke after one day. I've had this on 24/7 for over a week and so far so good!

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute Anklet!

product_meta.title: Billie Bijoux Womens 925 Sterling Silver Infinity Anklet Bracelet Endless Love Symbol Charm Adjustable Large Bracelet, Gift for Women Mother's Day
product_meta.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Package Dimensions :3.15 x 2.15 x 0.35 inches
 * Item model number :BBB004-1
 * Department :Womens
 * Date First Available :June 27, 2017
 * Manufacturer :Billie Bijoux
 * ASIN :B07GTFRV5W

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #19,658 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #35 inWomen's Anklets 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.5 out of 5 stars1,300 ratings
feature_bullets: 💕 DESIGN IDEA💕 A brilliant sterling silver infinity figure eight, symbolic of never ending love & friendship, the infinite and endless encircles the ankle on a shimmering chain. The meaning behind this 925 infinity silver anklet bracelet is actually quite beautiful—it symbolizes eternity, empowerment, and everlasting love. Only love can be divided endlessly and still not diminish. “I love you, always and forever”! It’s a great way for someone to tell another how much they care about another.

💕 SPECIFICATION 💕 BILLIE BIJOUX 925 sterling silver anklet bracelet Made of 925 Sterling Silver. Fastened with a sterling silver lobster clasp, this adjustable bracelet is punctuated by a beautiful infinity symbol, embellished with glittering white cubic zirconia to make it truly eye-catching. It also have 4 heart charms. Exquisite Polish Techniques and every item we create is a unique one-off design, never to be reproduced. Extension Design (22cm+5cm extension) to fit different wrist sizes

💕 SIZING INFORMATION 💕 PLEASE measure your ankle and choose the appropriate anklet size when you order. The size you choose in inches will be the anklet's length at its shortest length, and it will also have a extension chain (8.6in+2in). It also can used as a large bracelet. An easy way to measure your ankle is to wrap a string around your ankle and measure the exact length of the string. "

💕 IDEAL GIFT CHOICE 💕 The bracelet comes in a pretty white gift box. Perfect as a simple romantic gesture, suits for all age group. A perfect gift for your lover, wife, girlfriend, daughter, granddaughter or friends. Suitable for Valentine’s Day, Christmas’ Day, Mother’s Day, holiday, ball, party, anniversary, prom, graduation, birthday or any special occasions. If you have someone with whom you are deeply attached, you can give her the infinity bracelet. “My love for you has no end.”

💕 PERFECT AFTER-SALES SERVICE 💕 BILLIE BIJOUX is committed to provide the best jewelry and the best services to our customers, your feedback is our motivations to improve. We are looking forward to your review. 60 days product warranty, If for any reason you are not COMPLETELY satisfied during 180 days, let us know, you can get a fast, prompt refund. We aren’t happy until you are happy. Add it to your Wish List to keep an eye on the latest BILLIE BIJOUX of promotions!
